tier.item: He sent the letter to Maria.
`She brought me/us the basket.' / `She brought the basket here.'
`She brought me/us the basket.' / `She brought the basket here.'
`She baked a cake and brought it to me.'
`She baked a cake and brought it to me.'
She baked a cake and brought it to me.
They speared a pig for me.
`They speared a pig and brought it to me.'
`They speared a pig and brought it to me.'
They speared a pig and brought it to me.
`Catch my pig / catch a pig for me.'
`Catch my pig / catch a pig for me.'
Catch my pig / catch a pig for me.
`And then went until close to Logea.'
`And then went until close to Logea.'
And then went until close to Logea.
